channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Folders Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Folders Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-40338|2024-08-02T18:31:53.633Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20folders%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Folders Plugin 6.846.v23698686f0f6 and earlier displays an error message that includes an absolute path of a log file when attempting to access the Scan Organization Folder Log if no logs are available, exposing information about the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2023-40337|2024-08-02T18:31:53.670Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20folders%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Folders Plugin 6.846.v23698686f0f6 and earlier allows attackers to copy a view inside a folder.

item.title: CVE-2023-40336|2024-08-02T18:31:53.305Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20folders%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Folders Plugin 6.846.v23698686f0f6 and earlier allows attackers to copy folders.
